transferProductToStorage.transferProductTitle: Transfer Product to Intermediary or Final LN2 Storage
transferProductToStorage.noteDescription: If Intermediary Storage is used – steps for the transfer of bag/cassette from intermediary storage to LN2 freezer is captured on the next page
transferProductToStorage.important: IMPORTANT: Please place the cryopreserved apheresis material into liquid nitrogen storage as soon as possible upon receipt and ensure all checks have been performed and verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette and frozen bag with care and control at all times.
transferProductToStorage.removeCassette1: Remove Cassette 1 and Bag 1 from LN2 shipper and scan to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 1 and bag 1 to storage.
transferProductToStorage.removeCassette2: Remove Cassette 2 and Bag 2 from LN2 shipper and scan to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 2 and bag 2 to storage.
transferProductToStorage.removeCassette3: Remove Cassette 3 and Bag 3 from LN2 shipper and scan to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 3 and bag 3 to storage.
transferProductToStorage.removeCassette4: Remove Cassette 4 and Bag 4 from LN2 shipper and scan to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 4 and bag 4 to storage.
transferProductToStorage.enterDinSecCassette1: Enter the DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.enterDinSecCassette2: Enter the DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.enterDinSecCassette3: Enter the DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.enterDinSecCassette4: Enter the DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.enterDinBag1: Enter the DIN for Cryopreservation Bag
transferProductToStorage.enterDinSecBag1: Enter the DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for Cryopreservation Bag
transferProductToStorage.enterDinSecBag2: Enter DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for the Cryopreservation Bag
transferProductToStorage.enterDinSecBag3: Enter DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for the Cryopreservation Bag
transferProductToStorage.enterDinSecBag4: Enter DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for the Cryopreservation Bag
transferProductToStorage.enterDinCassette1: Enter the DIN for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.enterDinCassette2: Enter the DIN for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.enterDinCassette3: Enter the DIN for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.enterDinCassette4: Enter the DIN for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.enterDinBag2: Enter DIN for the Cryopreservation Bag
transferProductToStorage.enterDinBag3: Enter DIN for the Cryopreservation Bag
transferProductToStorage.enterDinBag4: Enter DIN for the Cryopreservation Bag
transferProductToStorage.removeCassette: Remove cassette 1 and bag 1 from the LN2 shipper and scan the LN2 shipper label to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 1 and bag 1 to storage and scan to capture the time of this step.
transferProductToStorage.removeCassetteCclpCilta: Remove cassette 1 and bag 1 from the LN2 shipper and scan the LN2 Packing insert to capture the time of this step. Then transfer cassette 1 and bag 1 to storage and scan to capture the time of this step.
transferProductToStorage.scanCoi: Scan the COI on the cassette label
transferProductToStorage.scanOrEnterCoi: Scan or enter the COI on the cassette label
transferProductToStorage.scanCoiBag: Scan the COI on the bag
transferProductToStorage.scanOrEnterCoiBag: Scan or enter the COI on the bag
transferProductToStorage.dinSecCryopreservationCassette1: Enter the DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for Cryopreservation Cassette
transferProductToStorage.dinSecBagIdentifier: Enter DIN/SEC-DIS/Apheresis ID for the Cryopreservation Bag

productReceipt.bagAndCassetteExpectedConditionEmea: Is each bag and cassette in the expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact the Vein to Vein team for further instructions.
productReceipt.bagFreeFromCracks: Is the bag free from cracks, openings, or other visible damage that could potentially compromise the integrity of the material? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact the Vein to Vein team for further instructions.
productReceipt.bagAndCassetteExpectedConditionCiltaUs: Is each bag and cassette in the expected condition (e.g. no cassette damage, label adhered)? If bag(s) or cassette(s) is not in expected condition, please contact the Vein to Vein team for further instructions.

manufacturingTransferProductToShipper.note: IMPORTANT: Please place the CAR-T product into the liquid nitrogen shipper as soon as possible and ensure all checks have been performed and verified. The frozen bag is fragile. Always handle the cassette and frozen bag with care and control at all times.
manufacturingTransferProductToShipper.removeCassette2: Remove cassette 1 from storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Next, transfer the cassette into the LN2 shipper and scan the COI number on the LN2 Packing insert to capture the timestamp of this step.
manufacturingTransferProductToShipper.removeCassette: Remove cassette 1 from storage and scan to capture the time of this step. Next, transfer the cassette into the LN2 shipper and scan the COI number on the LN2 shipper label to capture the timestamp of this step.
